meanings.definition: Not making careful choices or distinctions
meanings.sent1: She was so unselective in her food choices that she would eat anything on her plate.
meanings.sent2: The unselective shopper grabbed items randomly off the shelves without checking the prices.
meanings.sent3: His unselective approach to fashion led to some interesting outfit combinations.
meanings.sent4: The unselective nature of the artist's brushstrokes created a chaotic yet intriguing painting.
meanings.sent5: The unselective student picked random answers on the test without reading the questions carefully.

meanings.definition: Not selective or discriminating in choosing
meanings.sent1: The unselective hiring process resulted in a team with diverse skills but lacking cohesion.
meanings.sent2: Being unselective in her friendships, she welcomed everyone into her social circle.
meanings.sent3: The unselective approach to movie night meant they ended up watching a random documentary.
meanings.sent4: His unselective taste in music ranged from classical symphonies to heavy metal.
meanings.sent5: The unselective recruitment strategy brought in candidates with varied backgrounds and experiences.
